resources.string: Test your Spanish vocabulary with Falling Words App. To win the game, you have to score 5 points. If the translation is right, then press the CORRECT button and if the translation is wrong, press the WRONG button. You will have 7 seconds to select the option. You have three lives($). If you do not select/select wrong, then lives will be deducted.
Repetition is the mother of learning.
